TopicTitle: Does anyone have a midi file of the music in the credits?

Articles.Content:
Which would be this:

I'm looking for a midi file of that, does anyone know of one?
I'm going to bump this. I could really use a midi file of the song as well.
You could try to use a converter if you don't want to (or can't) make it yourself.

I dont have a midi file, but i like this Version of the song a little better.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53047-Epic-KSP-Theme-song-Space-theme-%28update-3%29

But yeah, you could use a converter and extract it from the Video.

Or just ask Harvester nicely, since it's his creation.

He might actually release a midi version of (for non-commercial use) if we flatter him enough

(As in not only coming up with KSP, but actually writing the theme song.)
youtube-mp3.org is a good converter, assuming you have the right to download it (correct me if i'm wrong).

I dont have a midi file, but i like this Version of the song a little better.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53047-Epic-KSP-Theme-song-Space-theme-%28update-3%29

But yeah, you could use a converter and extract it from the Video.

Not going to necropost on that thread but that was the awesomest thing I've heard today. No foolin.

I dont have a midi file, but i like this Version of the song a little better.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53047-Epic-KSP-Theme-song-Space-theme-%28update-3%29

Despite my well spent youth as a Sabbath fan and spending my few hours on stage hammering out heavy riffs I have to say (and it might be my alarming age that is speaking) that I like the laid back lounge jazz.

It just fits KSP.
